content_blocks.title: Where I am now
content_blocks.blurb: Where I am right now, I am want to learn this, that, and that. What I'm most interested in is this and I can't wait to have a mentor to actually show me how.

content_blocks.title: Integrating me work
content_blocks.blurb: I love to link interesting things and love tech because it lets me think about all sorts of shit. I love software development for its craft, which is related to me being an artist.

content_blocks.title: Where I want to be down the line
content_blocks.blurb: I'm pretty young and new to the industry, and i want to keep learning. With my nontraditional path, I am so excited to learn about formal things.
